Home.formattedText:
Welcome to my little corner of the Internet. Feel free to browse the apps I currently have available.

If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact me at ringnecksoft@mac.com

BulletDrop+.formattedText:
BulletDrop+

External ballistics calculator.

This is an expansion upon my first iOS app, BulletDrop.

Features:

  • Save frequently used data sets so they can be easily retrieved later.
  • Restore data from iCloud and share across iOS devices.
  • Selectable drop models. The majority of published ballistics coefficients (BC) are measured using the G1 or Ingalls model. Some manufacturers also publish BCs using the G7 model. Please consult your projectile manufacturer’s documentation.
  • Fetch local weather condition.

Thank all of you for your support. It has been humbling to say the least. You continue to remind me that shooters and gun people are some of the best people on the planet.

Download BulletDrop+ from the Apple AppStore.

PiTimer.formattedText:
PiTimer

A clean, simple visual timer.

This is useful for any situation where you want a visual representation of time remaining. Especially useful for timing children at home or in class. If fact, I wrote PieTimer for my wife for that very purpose and our kids love it.

You can set the time for a few seconds up to 24 hours with the swipe of your finger.

Download PiTimer from the Apple AppStore.

Privacy.formattedText:
Privacy Policy

Ringneck Software, LLC builds it apps as a service and they are intended for use as is.

Information Collection and Use

Ringneck Software, LLC does not collect or retain any identifying information about you.

Log Data

We want to inform you that whenever you use our Service, in a case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your device called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing our Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

Links to Other Sites

This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at ringnecksoft@mac.com.
